name: Tetrix (EchoNotGecko)
description:
Arrow keys to change level on title screen, move tetrominoes during game
Z and X to rotate tetrominoes
Space to hard drop tetrominoes

This is just something I made in my free time, I'll probably refine it and add more in the future but for now it's just a little experiment.
